title: Drawing, "Rough sketch, suggestion for lobby, for Uris Hotels", December 14, 1950
markings: Stamped in black ink, lower right: ROUGH SKETCH / HENRY DREYFUSS, 4 WEST 58TH STREET, N.Y.C.
signed: Signed in graphite, lower center: 12-14-50 JM.
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, upper right: Flames (?) Cigar Down (?); center left: DESK; center right: LOBBY; lower center: Suggestion for Lobby.
description: Design for the lobby of the Uris Hotel.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Rough sketch, suggestion for lobby, for Uris Hotels", December 14, 1950.
December 14, 1950. Crayon on off-white tracing paper. Gift of Henry Dreyfuss. 1972-88-394.
